org.waarp.openr66.protocol.localhandler.packet

Class ErrorPacket

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.waarp.openr66.protocol.localhandler.packet.AbstractLocalPacket
      • org.waarp.openr66.protocol.localhandler.packet.ErrorPacket

  • public class ErrorPacket
extends AbstractLocalPacket
    Error Message class for packet

    2 strings+1 error code: sheader,smiddle,code
